title.rendered: “IDF Reveals Names of Eight Fallen Soldiers: Details, Photos, and Updates on Wounded Personnel”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF spokesman about the names of eight IDF casualties whose notification has been given to their families: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC13122023NEROGHEDUHGV

Also attached is a link to the IDF website, where their details and pictures are published and updated:
https://www.idf.il/59780

In addition, in the battle last night in which Golani division soldiers fell, a soldier from battalion 51, Golani division was seriously injured.

Also, in the battle in which Sgt. Uriah Jacob, may he rest in peace, fell yesterday (Tuesday), a soldier from battalion 614, the school of combat engineering, and a documentation soldier from the IDF spokesman’s unit were seriously injured.

Furthermore, a soldier from battalion 605, the combat engineering corps, was seriously injured in a battle in the north of the Gaza Strip.

All the injured were evacuated for medical treatment at the hospital. Their families have been updated.
